segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her plate, missing all the trouble around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spilling out, soaking everything sadly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle at her feet will only get worse, and she doesn't know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable, reaching for cookies he shouldn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is unstable; I fear for his safety already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there hoping, but this secrecy feels lonely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, but inside it's full of unnoticed sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cookie jar tempts them into risk, poor things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes like nothing's wrong, but everything is teetering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heartstrings with its quiet dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame such a cozy kitchen holds these hidden troubles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They deserve better than this impending mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR
